#Matrix transposition

Calculate the transposition of Matrix A

$$
A = 
\begin{bmatrix}
 1 & 2 & 3 \\
 4 & 5 & 6 \\
\end{bmatrix}\ \ \
A^T =
\begin{bmatrix}
 \dots & \dots \\
 \dots & \dots \\
 \dots & \dots \\
\end{bmatrix}
$$
#Properties of transpose

Properties:

+ $(A^T)^{T} = A$
+ $(A + B)^{T} = A^{T} + B^{T}$
+ $(AB)^{T} = B^{T}A^{T}$ 
\\
Given

$$
A=
\begin{bmatrix}
 1 & 2 & 3 \\
 4 & 5 & 6 \\
\end{bmatrix} \ \ \
B = 
\begin{bmatrix}
 -1 & 4 \\
 2 & -3 \\
 1 & 0 \\
\end{bmatrix}
$$

Calculate:

1) $(B^T)^{T}$

2) $(A + B)^{T}$

3) $(AB)^{T}$

#Trace of a Matrix

Given 

$$
C =
\begin{bmatrix}
 1 & 2 & 3 \\
 4 & 5 & 6 \\
 7 & 8 & 9 \\
\end{bmatrix} \ \ \
D = 
\begin{bmatrix}
 5 & 6 & 3 & -2\\
 -1 & 1 & 2 & -1\\
 4 & -1 & -2 & 3\\
 3 & 4 & -1 & -1 \\
\end{bmatrix}
$$

Calculate:

1) Trace(C)

2) Trace(D)
